column4: Ha, thats great, a .mov file playing fine for me, but wont for my friend on windows even though he has the quicktime plugin and the latest one.
this is the part where you remember you are superior to winblows
apt-get remove removes that package and every package it depended on that is not depended on by anything else
if you are an ex windows user, you can think of mke2fs -c as a "full format"
